title: Where Are The New Skins and Missions?
body:
Hey Riot,
I was wondering why the new skins and missions aren't out because it says on Patch 7.2 they're supposed to be.
Thank You

replies.body: New content like skins announced on the patch notes doesn't necessarily mean it will be released on the same day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for more updates on the good stuff.  Hang tight until then!
